attributes.action: Cutting of Patient care breaches breaches duty of care in the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
I speak from my personal experience at my local nhs, that cut-off my care.  This made me feel like a medical orphan, as I have complex needs.  I declined to take medical action to restore my care at this hospital as I feared I would be bullied.

Cutting-off patient care of patients with complex health conditions should be made unlawful.
